name: vscode-gsc
description: Language support for different GSC (game script) versions

scripts.vscode:prepublish: npm run build && npm run compile

GSC.intelliSense.enable.keywords.markdownDescription: Auto complete keywords (if, for, switch, ...) with IntelliSense.

GSC.intelliSense.enable.callablesGame.markdownDescription: Auto complete inbuilt (engine) functions and methods with IntelliSense.
enumDescriptions: Don't auto complete inbuilt functions and methods.
Only auto complete inbuilt functions and methods not marked as deprecated (these are usually non-functioning).
Auto complete all inbuilt functions and methods.

GSC.intelliSense.enable.callablesScript.markdownDescription: Auto complete script-defined functions and methods with IntelliSense.

GSC.intelliSense.conciseMode.markdownDescription: Make documentation entries more concise (e. g. replacing tags such as *@param* or *@return* with concise emoji versions ‚ú¥Ô∏è‚ú≥Ô∏è or ‚Ü©Ô∏è).

GSC.intelliSense.foldersSorting.markdownDescription: Determine how to sort folders when auto completing file paths with IntelliSense.
enumDescriptions: Sort folders to the beginning of the list.
Sort folders to the end of the list (files first).
Always sort alphabetically (mix files and folders)

GSC.colors.enable.markdownDescription: Display color picker on vector literals with components 0 ‚â§ x ‚â§ 1.
enumDescriptions: Only show color picker when all components are quotients (e.g. üü© (0/255, 255/255, 20/255)).
Always show color picker on applicable vectors. (This can identify vectors as colors which are not intended as such.)

GSC.featureSets.IW3.markdownDescription: Define sets of engine features to be used (by IntelliSense and semantic highlighting) for **Call of Duty 4: Modern Warfare**.

common.description: Base game features shared between SP & MP.

unleashed.description: Features available when targeting the CoD4: Unleashed Server mod.

GSC.featureSets.IW4.markdownDescription: Define sets of engine features to be used (by IntelliSense and semantic highlighting) for **Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 2**.

common.description: Base game features shared between SP & MP.

iw4x.description: Features available when targeting the IW4X client.

GSC.rootDirectories.IW3.markdownDescription:
Root directory paths where stock or custom GSC files are found for **Call of Duty 4: Modern Warfare**. When a file exists in multiple paths, later paths takes precedence.

E. g. `C:\games\iw3\raw`

GSC.rootDirectories.IW4.markdownDescription:
Root directory paths where stock or custom GSC files are found for **Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 2**. When a file exists in multiple paths, later paths takes precedence.

E. g. `C:\games\iw4\userraw`
